text: Duplex (released in the United Kingdom and Ireland as Our House and in Poland as The Old Lady Must Go) is a 2003 American black comedy film directed by Danny DeVito (who also narrated the film) and written by Larry Doyle. The film stars Ben Stiller, Drew Barrymore, Eileen Essell, Harvey Fierstein, Justin Theroux and James Remar. ==Cast== * Ben Stiller as Alex Rose * Drew Barrymore as Nancy Kendricks * Eileen Essell as Mrs. Connelly * Harvey Fierstein as Kenneth * Justin Theroux as Coop * James Remar as Chick * Robert Wisdom as Officer Dan * Swoosie Kurtz as Jean * Wallace Shawn as Herman * Maya Rudolph as Tara * Amber Valletta as Celine * Michelle Krusiec as Dr. Kang * Tracey Walter as Pharmacy Customer * Danny DeVito as Narrator (voice) Category:2003 movies Category:American movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about writers Category:Movies set in Brooklyn Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies directed by Danny DeVito Category:Miramax movies Category:2003 comedy movies
title: Duplex (movie)
